name: The Gods
description:
Welcome to the Celestial Museum of the Gods.

The Gods is a simple, calm, short puzzle game that introduces the heavenly bodies of the solar system through the Roman and Greek Gods they were named after. 

Collect the corresponding artefacts to activate each heavenly body and be rewarded with blessings along the way from the Gods. 

What reward awaits you at the end?

---

This solo mini project is the product of my first ever game jam, cultimation of solid hard work of studying game development for the past five months.

May the Gods be with you through your journey through the cosmos and myth.
